name: Ice Pogo
description:
Description

Ice Pogo may look cute but it's only for those who like punishment. As the title suggests, you will have to guide pogoing, cute, fuzzy creatures through dangerous obstacles. This is not so easy as the pogo action is forced and the camera scroll is constant.

How to play

Use the mouse to click the menu options

A and D - Move player

Arrow Keys - Move player

Gamepad left thumb-stick - Move player (experimental)

P key - Pause the game

Collect the gems to spend in the in-game shop. Here you can unlock other creatures.

Make sure you collide with the North Poles. These checkpoint your progress. You can quit your play session and return to the latest checkpoint the next time you launch the game.

Once you have reached the "Challenge Zone" you have finished the main stretch of the game. However, the challenge zone is never-ending, this allows you to unlock all playable characters and continue your fun!

BE AWARE OF THE RESET GAME BUTTON! (located in the About menu) This will delete all progress and reset the in-game currency. Only use if you are sure you want to play from scratch.
